title: Godless_By Moebius
description:
Bhoothada is a small inconspicuous clay totem that the tribe of the artist's origin, the Dhodias, believed to be a protector of spirits of those who are gone from this earth. After experiencing a personal loss, he first came upon this figurine in rural Gujarat and the form evoked in him a sense of antiquity and yet a kind of timelessness. Not much about this particular motif is available online or in literature, which then inspired him to explore the form visually through a series of personal artworks. He started to develop his own myths around the artworks, adding in motifs and embellishments, and this particular artwork was one of them.
It represents a raw, primal connection to earth, fire, and sky. It’s a rejection of the sterile, the sanitized, the worship of a singular god in a box. Instead, it’s the wild dance of rituals forgotten by time, where the sun and moon still speak and the earth hums beneath your feet. It’s chaos, it’s freedom, it’s power in the places where the spirits of old still whisper and burn.

title: Sangharsh_By Okami
description:
This artwork by Okami captures a moment of raw intensity, depicting Rakshasa and Asura locked in a ferocious struggle, their colossal forms entwined in hand-to-hand combat. Clutching and pushing against each other with immense force, they embody an eternal clash — one between supernatural chaos and scientific order.

This composition serves as a meditation on duality, illustrating the fine line between myth and technology, the primordial and the engineered. Though they stand in opposition, their mirrored forms and sheer power reveal the truth: the forces of the supernatural and the advancements of human ingenuity are not so different after all. Through this dynamic confrontation, the artwork challenges the viewer to contemplate the convergence of ancient legend and modern creation, where destruction and innovation become two sides of the same cosmic struggle.

title: Nitro // 002
description: The Urban Monkey Nitro Vision sunglasses combine sleek design with advanced functionality. These sport-ready shades feature a wraparound semi-rimless frame and blue lenses for superior UV protection and reduced glare, perfect for high-performance activities in bright conditions. Complete with a case and microfiber cloth for safekeeping.

title: Nitro // 003
description: The Urban Monkey Nitro Vision sunglasses combine sleek design with advanced functionality. These sport-ready shades feature a wraparound black semi-rimless frame and green lenses for superior UV protection and reduced glare, perfect for high-performance activities in bright conditions.Complete with a case and microfiber cloth for safekeeping.

title: Nitro // 001
description: The Urban Monkey Nitro Vision sunglasses combine sleek design with advanced functionality. These sport-ready shades feature a wraparound black semi-rimless frame and silver mirrored lenses for superior UV protection and reduced glare, perfect for high-performance activities in bright conditions.Complete with a case and microfiber cloth for safekeeping.

title: Isro_By Screenseva
description:
For a country stereotyped to be full of mysticism and engineers, space exploration feels like one of the most symbiotic relationships. There have been multiple fictional narratives around how the west sees space exploration in their films but there have been so few in India.

Maybe it's because of the lack of scientific temperament (wildly), maybe it's not an important enough topic to talk about. Maybe there are too many distractions in the interest-air. But we can somewhere realize how powerful space exploration narratives were for us who wanted to be astronauts when we were a kid. Not just being on top of the world but out of the world (the most mysterious).

Look closer. The crescent moon, the celestial spark – these are not mere decorations. They are echoes, reminders of the mysteries we strive to understand. And below, the Ashoka Chakra, a grounding force, a connection to the roots from which we rise.

title: Stallions_By Bhaukal
description: Stallion is more than just a wild horse, it’s anything that carries the spirit of strength, pride, and celebration. Everything that brings joy, energy, and confidence. The ones who cannot be tamed. These are the stallions we champion. This artwork is the stallions.

title: Rakshasa_By Okami
description:
Rakshasa is a commanding portrayal of a colossal demon. Its ferocious expression, beastly features, and six powerful arms embody the fearsome essence of the rakshasas from Hindu mythology. Traditionally depicted as formidable adversaries to peace and order, RAKSHASA exudes an overwhelming presence, standing as the very antithesis of harmony and balance.

Its dynamic pose is imbued with symbolic depth—each of its six arms is arranged in distinct mudras, evoking ancient gestures of power and intent. The figure’s stance echoes the fervent intensity of Tandava, the cosmic dance of destruction, reinforcing its role as an agent of chaos. Further amplifying its primal energy, Rakshasa is depicted astride a colossal serpent, an embodiment of untamed force and peril, solidifying its connection to the wild, unrestrained forces of disorder and transformation.

title: Malice_By Bhaukal
description: From a state of chaos, and conflict, 'Malice' is a dark but ironic take on good and evil. Mischievous, red-devils representing playful malevolence and a satire of evil. Their expressions blur the lines between humor and menace. This piece critiques how malice and destruction are often trivialized, turning something inherently dangerous into something oddly lighthearted. By mixing elements of traditional demonic imagery with a sense of movement and energy. Whether as a statement on violence, a nod to rebellious spirit, or simply an appreciation for the aesthetic of chaos. 'Malice' makes a statement without taking itself too seriously.

title: Good morning Blues_By Khatra
description: For seven years, Khatra’s A6 sketchbook has served as a personal archive honoring forgotten African American blues musicians. What began as a quiet pastime became a detailed visual tribute to pioneers whose raw voices, guitar styles, and storytelling carried the weight of struggle, love, and resilience. With mainstream recognition fading, they documented these legends through mixed-media sketches inspired by old photos, record covers, and lyrics. The work often resembles woodcut prints layered with typography and calligraphy. One piece depicts Robert Johnson beneath a tree with his guitar, a wooden hut behind him, and the words “Good Morning Blues, how do you do.” Like the rest of the sketchbook, it keeps the spirit of the blues alive—celebrating voices that still echo, waiting to be heard again.

title: Chrome_by Khatra
description: First painted at Elements 0.1 Jam in Delhi (2022), the work deconstructs letters into pure shapes—rectangles, triangles, ovals—layered with gradients, grafts, and textures. The clash of clean geometry and chaotic color reflects his philosophy: precision meeting instinct. Rooted in graffiti but aligned with post-graffiti and anti-style, KHATRA Chrome embraces imperfection and spontaneity. It represents the spillover of his digital practice into the streets, balancing the discipline of type design with graffiti’s untamed energy.

title: Royal Monkey
description: Centuries of legend, stitched into one tee. The Royal Monkey celebrates the untamed spirit of Sun Wukong — the Monkey King — reimagined for today’s streets. Inspired by the ancient tale, the artwork on the back captures his journey from celestial battles to mastering balance, freedom, and discipline. Crafted in jet black, this oversized tee blends premium streetwear with storytelling. The front stays clean and minimal, while the intricate gold back print of the Monkey King speaks louder.

title: UM Pin Tuck Core // Moss Green
description: Introducing our first-ever pin tuck core tee. It’s a fresh take on the classic oversized core silhouette sharpened with engineered pin tucks running down the body and sleeves for added structure and shape. Finished with a moss-toned acid wash, the fabric carries a lived-in softness and a vintage fade that makes every piece unique.

title: Bio Hazard Mnky
description: 1250A fresh take on our signature Core. This Vintage Core Tee is cut with a raglan fit, giving it a more relaxed drape and natural movement through the shoulders. Built from 220 GSM cotton, it holds structure without losing breathability, making it an all-day essential. The vintage wash and tone on tone print finish adds a timeworn character and softness straight out of the box, while the high-recovery rib knit neckline keeps its shape wear after wear. Oversized, effortless, and made in India — it’s Core, redefined.

title: Tail Eater
description: The Tail-Eater tee draws inspiration from the timeless myth of the serpent devouring its own tail which is a symbol of eternity, transformation, and self-destruction. Finished with a signature acid wash, the black base carries a faded, lived-in texture that makes every piece unique, enhancing the raw edge of the design. At its core lies a deeper truth: unchecked pride and endless hunger can trap us in cycles we cannot escape. The serpent, once a force of power, becomes a prisoner of its own desire — a mirror of the human tendency to spiral inward when ego overshadows clarity.

title: UM Heavyweight Core // Choco Moose
description: Step into our all-new heavyweight core. Cut from 380 GSM brushed fleece, it’s built heavier and softer on the inside, with a high-recovery rib knit neckline that holds shape wear after wear. The oversized fit and clean half-sleeve silhouette deliver all-day comfort. The deep bark-brown base carries a hand-treated acid wash, creating fiery highs and molten lows across the fabric — no two pieces are ever the same.

title: Legacy Heavyweight T-shirt // 003
description: The third edition of our sold-out Legacy series. Crafted in 380 GSM brushed fleece with a vintage acid wash, this brown oversized is a collector's piece that encapsulates the evolution of the iconic Urban Monkey logo. It's history you can wear. On this tee, witness a tale of Urban Monkey's journey through the concrete jungles to streetwear supremacy. From its inception to the present day.

title: Downtown Drift
description:
Downtown Drift throws it back to futuristic grit. Stamped on a bold cerulean blue base, the front graphic features a robotic skater mid-trick part machine all UMSB vibe. The oversized fit gives it that laidback energy, while the abstract textured print on the back keeps things unexpected. Whether you're skating through traffic or just drifting through your day, this tee brings chaos and control in equal measure.



At Urban Monkey’s core, skateboarding cultivates a spirit of unity and solidarity, forging deep bonds within a community that supports and uplifts one another. It transforms competition and strife into a society of true brotherhood and sisterhood, where collective growth and collaboration thrive.

title: Subway skater
description:
The Subway Skater Tee is all about comfort with edge. It’s soft from the first wear thanks to a lava-dyed frost grey base, giving it that easy, broken-in feel. The front graphic pops with layered HD + non-PVC print that stands out without feeling bulky. Oversized and breathable, this one’s made for everyday wear whether you’re skating through the city or just kicking back post-session. Built under the UMSB line, it reps skate culture the way it lives: loud, chill, and always in motion.


At Urban Monkey’s core, skateboarding cultivates a spirit of unity and solidarity, forging deep bonds within a community that supports and uplifts one another. It transforms competition and strife into a society of true brotherhood and sisterhood, where collective growth and collaboration thrive.

title: Crashline
description:
Crashline Tee feels like movement. Scribbled with bright hits of artwork and washed in a gritty, rocky texture that doesn’t sit still. Cut in an oversized silhouette with acid-washed black jersey, it’s the kind of tee that holds energy. The kind you throw on at sunrise and still have on at midnight because the day took you places. A visual journal for the streets, the crew, and the ride in between.


At Urban Monkey’s core, skateboarding cultivates a spirit of unity and solidarity, forging deep bonds within a community that supports and uplifts one another. It transforms competition and strife into a society of true brotherhood and sisterhood, where collective growth and collaboration thrive.

title: Night City
description:
Night City Skater is raw, charged, and built for the ones who treat the streets like a canvas. Washed in blended black with a rocky acid texture, this tee comes alive with spiked graphics up front and bold artwork on the back. It’s oversized and easy — made for pushing through packed alleys, underpasses, and late-night chaos. Wears like armor, moves like second skin.


At Urban Monkey’s core, skateboarding cultivates a spirit of unity and solidarity, forging deep bonds within a community that supports and uplifts one another. It transforms competition and strife into a society of true brotherhood and sisterhood, where collective growth and collaboration thrive.

title: Campus Skater
description:
Campus Skater channels the raw energy of early mornings at the spot and late nights with your crew. Washed in lavender marble and stamped with a bold front graphic, it carries that lived-in look from day one. It’s chill, it’s loud, and it moves through city streets, college halls, and every cracked pavement in between.


At Urban Monkey’s core, skateboarding cultivates a spirit of unity and solidarity, forging deep bonds within a community that supports and uplifts one another. It transforms competition and strife into a society of true brotherhood and sisterhood, where collective growth and collaboration thrive.

title: Metal Monkey // 002
description: Inspired by our Rage Hoodie this black snapback features UM in bold. Turn up the volume. Metal monkey is built for loud days and louder nights, with high-definition flame-style Urban Monkey embroidery front and centre on a clean black snapback. Crafted from 100% cotton for all-day wear, it features our UM-embossed silicone snapback closure for that perfect adjustable fit. Whether you’re hitting the streets or a late-night gig, this cap’s got the attitude to match your energy

title: Lowkey Luxe // Black
description: A cozy faux-fur build in all-black, finished with a sleek silicon label up front for a subtle flex. This black baseball cap is made from durable cotton for comfort, with an adjustable UM-branded buckle strap for a custom fit.

title: Docker Hat // 004
description: Looking for a cool accessory that keeps it low-key but hits just right? Enter: Urban Monkey’s vintage docker hats. Lightweight, low-profile, and crafted in classic charcoal black that goes with anything, this hat bring old-school cool wherever you roll.

title: Docker Hat // 003
description: Looking for a cool accessory that keeps it low-key but hits just right? Enter: Urban Monkey’s vintage docker hats. Lightweight, low-profile, and crafted in classic blue denim that goes with anything, this hat bring old-school cool wherever you roll.

title: Super Suede // 013
description: Easy on the eyes, easy on the fit. Crafted in ultra-soft super suede, this cream-and-chocolate baseball cap brings laid-back energy with a clean UM logo up front and a contrast brim for just the right pop.

title: Super Suede // 012
description: Crafted from luxe super suede, this navy-and-brown baseball cap brings easy versatility with a clean UM logo up front and a warm contrast brim. Lightweight and ready for everyday wear

title: Super Suede // 011
description: Neutral, clean, and easy to style. Crafted from our signature premium super suede, this steel grey baseball cap features a tonal UM logo up front, giving it a subtle edge while keeping things classic.

title: Dreamer // 002
description: Inspired by our Dreamer Unicorn Cap, this soft, unstructured, and blue like your best days off dad cap is built for your everyday wanderings. Crafted from 100% breathable cotton in a classic dad-cap shape, it features high-definition embroidery of a unicorn—because sometimes, you deserve to wear a little magic. Made for slow mornings, long walks, and to remind you to keep your head in the clouds.

title: Stay Woke
description: This off-white dad cap features a crisp black brim for contrast and a high-definition embroidered third eye postage stamp graphic—so you’re always sending out the right signals. Finished with an adjustable strap for a custom fit, this cap is ready to watch over your everyday moves, from coffee runs to skate sessions.

title: Amigos
description: Inspired by our peace hoodie designed in 2021, this baseball cap is going to become your new day-out essential, featuring three tiny homies on the run—because even your cap deserves a crew. Crafted in 100% cotton with a super suede contrast brim featuring a colourful flower motif on the brim keeps the vibe light. This dual-tone baseball cap blends comfort with playful street energy.

title: UM Varsity
description: Inspired by our Game Day Varsity jacket designed in 2021, this black baseball cap features a dual-fabric cotton + PU leather build for a crisp structure and elevated feel. Up front, high-definition Chanel embroidery spells out your hustle in sharp gothic script, while the side panels drop a reminder: your personal growth is on you. It’s designed to ride with you—day or night, drop or daily so you can move how you move, worry-free.

title: Chain Wallet // 002
description: Meet the compact evolution of our bestselling chain wallet. The Chain Wallet // 002 is smaller in size and built for those who carry light. Crafted from premium PVC-coated vegan leather with a bold gunmetal chain and carabiner, this wallet keeps your essentials close and your style closer. It’s compact, it packs smart: A secure snap closure opens up to reveal quick-access card slots, a hidden coin pocket, and a sleek currency sleeve — all laid out for everyday ease. The exterior features a clean, low-profile metal logo and a back pocket for on-the-go grabs. Proudly made in India.

title: Sunglasses Holder Case // 001
description: No case. No hassle. Say goodbye to bulky sunglass cases and scratched lenses. This sleek little gamechanger clips onto your belt loop, backpack, or sling — giving your shades a safe spot to hang when the sun dips or the clouds roll in. Made for the on-the-go, the laid-back, and everyone tired of digging through bags.

title: Trifold Wallet // 003
description: This Trifold Wallet // 003 in a rugged camo finish is designed for everyday utility and comes equipped with 7 easy-access card slots so your essentials are always within reach. A zippered exterior pocket keeps your loose change sorted, while the dedicated currency holder and clear ID slot help you stay organised on the move. Topped off with a velcro closure and a pop of orange via our signature silicon patch making it tough on the outside but organised on the inside.

title: Retro Stripe Resort Shirt
description: A breezy button-down shirt built for days that unfold slowly. With retro jacquard stripes running across a crisp white base, this shirt is cut in a relaxed fit with a clean resort collar for that laid-back, always-on-vacation vibe. The cotton-viscose blend keeps things breathable and drapey. Finished with contrast buttons, a woven side label, and side slits for easy movement.

title: Sunset Stripe Resort Shirt
description: A laid-back essential with coastal energy, the Sunset Stripe Resort Shirt brings together warmth and ease in equal measure. Crafted in a soft jacquard weave with bold red-toned stripes, this shirt channels retro vacation vibes while keeping things modern with a relaxed fit and resort collar. The breathable cotton-viscose blend makes it your go-to on hot days, while the side slits and button-down front give it just the right amount of structure.

title: Short Sleeve Polo Shirt // Khaki
description: A versatile short-sleeve shirt in breathable twill, designed with a relaxed fit that drapes easy but stays sharp. Quick snap-button closure, side slits for mobility, and drop shoulders that lean into comfort without slouching on style. Finished with clean embroidery at the chest — just enough to let ‘em know.

title: Short Sleeve Polo Shirt // Pista Green
description: A versatile short-sleeve shirt in breathable twill, designed with a relaxed fit that drapes easy but stays sharp — perfect for long summer days. Quick snap-button closure, side slits for mobility, and drop shoulders that lean into comfort without slouching on style. Finished with clean embroidery at the chest — just enough to let ‘em know.

title: Coastal Soul Resort Shirt
description: This shirt brings the shoreline to your wardrobe. Cut in an airy, oversized silhouette from textured cotton gauze, it features ocean-inspired embroidery on the front — from shells to starfish and everything in between. The resort collar and drop shoulders dial up the ease, while side slits and twin woven labels add subtle utility. Lightweight, breathable, and built to drift effortlessly from coastlines to city streets.

title: Here now
description: Some thoughts don’t need to shout — they just need to land. This tee carries one of them. At first glance it's soft, approachable, warm clay. But look again, and it starts to speak. In timelines, in truths, in tender reminders. There’s no alternate reality. No what-ifs. Just this moment, this breath and this step. A quiet message etched into a playful visual — made to meet you wherever you are, then gently pull you into now.

title: Colourblocked Casual Shirt // 001
description: A sharp clash of utility and ease — this shirt blends workwear energy with casual cool. Built in a houndstooth weave with colorblocked panels, it features a boxy pocket and bartack-secured side slit. Cut in a regular fit from a cotton-nylon mix, it’s breathable yet tough enough for everyday runs. Bowling cut meets clean lines, making it a go-to for function-forward fits.

title: Antardrishti
description: The outer form is a frame. The real seeing begins within. This tee sits at the edge of the visible and the internal — washed in dusty rose, worn like memory. The artwork on the back unravels like a deity through a kaleidoscope: human, symbolic, mirrored, strange. It’s not asking you to understand. It’s asking you to notice. The figure stands still, but everything around it moves — a visual metaphor for the quiet chaos inside us all.

title: Colourblocked Casual Shirt // 002
description: A sharp clash of utility and ease — this shirt blends workwear energy with casual/street cool. Built in a houndstooth weave with colorblocked panels, it features a boxy pocket and bartack-secured side slit. Cut in a regular fit from a cotton-nylon mix, it’s breathable yet tough enough for everyday runs. Bowling cut meets clean lines, making it a go-to for function-forward fits.

title: Khel
description:
Purpose is for machines as Play is for us. This tee is a nudge back to that truth.
Dipped in pale purple and acid-washed down to imperfection, it wears like a question mark — open-ended and unresolved. The oversized silhouette holds space for contradiction-philosophy rendered in childlike typography with deep thought balanced by a turntable spinning joy in the corner. On the back, the word “KHEL” stands tall which is a reminder, in two scripts, that maybe life’s not meant to be solved, but to be played with.

title: Paradise // Black
description: A black canvas for human contradiction — stitched with emotion, scattered with truth. This tee maps out a surreal constellation of feeling: from Pain falling like rain from an eye, to Lust blooming in clouds of candy. Passion awakens in circuits, Deception hides in color. Greed laces sneakers with want, and Flow reminds you to tie your laces before you leap. Each figure floats — alone, yet connected. Each one a fragment. Together, a system.

title: Mr. Rager
description: This tee is a tribute to the restless — for the ones who burn through the night chasing something they can’t name. On the back, MR. RAGER sits in multi-colour reflective print, only visible when the light hits just right — like most of what this tee’s really about. Darted shoulders add shape, and the upgraded neck rib brings structure.

title: Fck’ Em
description: This tee is a transmission from the inside — raw emotional code laid bare. The front builds a digital shrine to intensity, with chaotic lines, wireframe objects, and a red energy burst like something trying to break out. On the back, the word 'Fck ‘Em' floats above a scattered monologue. It’s glitchy, painful, honest — and still, it flowers. Designed in an oversized fit with a reinforced neck rib and a UM Systms™ silicon patch on the sleeve. Proof that even broken thoughts can grow something.

title: Convertible Jacket // JK01
description: This jacket folds into itself — literally. The JK01 isn’t just outerwear, it’s an engineered transition. Zip it up, flip it inside out, and boom- it becomes a compact carry pouch. Designed under Urbnmnky-Systms™, it's packed with quick-dry tech fabric, double chest zipper pockets, snap-secured waist pockets, and a sharp diamond-cut collar. Whether it’s on your back or in your bag, this piece proves that functionality doesn’t have to look boring. It’s not just street-smart — it’s crazy-smart.

title: Kids See Ghosts
description: Fck being polite. Fck shrinking yourself. This black t-shirt is for the ones who’ve stopped explaining. The graphic features a face pulled through static, a crow mid-flight, and grids trying to contain what was never built to fit. It’s chaos. It’s coded. It’s done asking. Just loud — without speaking. Designed in an oversized silhouette with an upgraded neck rib and improved fit, it’s built to hold its shape while you break yours.

title: Short Sleeve Off White Shirt // Lost Angels
description: Introducing Old School Bowling Shirts, reimagined. This shirt is a portal to a mythic metropolis—now cast in off-white, a softer canvas that carries the echoes of a dystopian dream. The front keeps things minimal but meaningful. But the back? That’s where the legend lives. A sprawling illustration unfolds like a celestial diagram—an abstract butterfly emerging from disorder, flanked by sacred geometry and symbology that feels both ancient and futuristic. Made for the style alchemist who blends streetwear with storytelling.

title: Upgraded Relaxed Straight-Cut Track Pants // Black
description:
You asked, we listened. Our bestselling relaxed fit track pants are back—this time, with an upgrade that lasts. Last drop, we heard your feedback about the print detail peeling off too soon. So, we took action. We swapped the print for high-quality embroidery that won’t fade, won’t peel—just pure durability that stays fresh, wash after wash.

Made from stretch fabric for effortless movement, these pants are built for versatility—whether you're chilling indoors or stepping out. In classic black and grey, they’re not just a fan favorite—they’re a wardrobe essential. The best part? They’re here to stay.

title: Upgraded Relaxed Straight-Cut Track Pants // Grey
description:
You asked, we listened. Our bestselling relaxed fit track pants are back—this time, with an upgrade that lasts. Last drop, we heard your feedback about the print detail peeling off too soon. So, we took action. We swapped the print for high-quality embroidery that won’t fade, won’t peel—just pure durability that stays fresh, wash after wash.

Made from stretch fabric for effortless movement, these pants are built for versatility—whether you're chilling indoors or stepping out. In classic black and grey, they’re not just a fan favorite—they’re a wardrobe essential. The best part? They’re here to stay.

title: Metal Head Trucker
description:
This ain’t your average trucker. Built high, stitched hard, and strapped for the streets.
This high top snapback trucker all-black beast features diamond-stitch detailing on the front panel and a cold metal badge that doesn’t just flex—it declares war on basics. Backed with breathable mesh foam and locked in with a silicon-embossed velcro strap, it’s made to stay cool when the block gets hot.

title: Lowkey Luxe // Brown
description: Brown never looked this wild. This one’s got texture for days—faux fur up front, mesh foam in the back, and a corduroy curve to top it off. Topped with a silicon label and locked in with a silicon-embossed velcro strap, it’s built for the street but ready for the spotlight.

title: Lowkey Luxe // Hot Cocoa
description: A whole vibe in chocolate brown, this dad cap flips the classic with faux fur flavor and a corduroy brim that hits differently. Stamped with a silicon label and strapped with a self-fabric corduroy band + metal UM buckle, it's serving cozy flex with a vintage twist.

title: Intrglctc
description: Transcending the limits of time and space, INTRGLCTC is a blacked-out masterpiece designed for those who move beyond the ordinary. Inspired by the vast, uncharted depths of the universe, this limited-edition collectible timepiece is a fusion of futuristic aesthetics and high-performance design. With a stealth black analog-digital display, layered 3D components, and an ultra-modern case, INTRGLCTC warps you into a dimension where style meets innovation.

title: Inbtwn // Silver
description:
Where past meets future. The second edition of L00P emerges in stainless steel, created by URBNMNKY-SYSTMS, Urban Monkey's division for experimental lifestyle accessories. This collectible explores the infinite space between binaries: [PAST] [FUTURE] to emphasize the PRESENT MOMENT expressing time as an ornament, through modular and parametric design detailing.

LOOP
Urban Monkey's first venture into experimental accessories - an analog+digital watch, released in three variants: Moon, Astro, and Origin. Designed as a collectible art piece, it explored our perception of time through messages like "Keep Moving Forward", "Be here now" & "Don't let time govern you". The collection's resonance was unprecedented, selling out in 40 minutes. Its campaign revolutionized product presentation in India, by blurring reality and simulation through detailed 3D world-building.

URBNMNKYSYSTMS
A sub brand within Urban Monkey focusing on experimental, hyper-functional accessories. Its vision is to create an ecosystem of objects that plug into each other to form a whole, while also retaining their individual characteristics. This modular approach embodies continuous evolution, where each product is part of a larger adaptive system.

title: Two-Tone Resort Shirt // 001
description: Introducing the Urban Monkey Two-Tone Resort Shirt, where sleek design meets bold contrast. This shirt features a striking diagonal cut and sew panel design in deep black and cool grey, giving off an effortlessly edgy vibe. Made from premium lightweight fabric, it delivers the perfect balance of comfort and streetwear drip. The relaxed fit and clean button-down silhouette make it ideal for day-to-night transitions. Subtle Urban Monkey embroidery completes the look.

title: Inbtwn // Black
description:
Where past meets future. The second edition of L00P emerges in stainless steel, created by URBNMNKY-SYSTMS, Urban Monkey's division for experimental lifestyle accessories. This collectible explores the infinite space between binaries: [PAST] [FUTURE] to emphasize the PRESENT MOMENT expressing time as an ornament, through modular and parametric design detailing.

LOOP
Urban Monkey's first venture into experimental accessories - an analog+digital watch, released in three variants: Moon, Astro, and Origin. Designed as a collectible art piece, it explored our perception of time through messages like "Keep Moving Forward", "Be here now" & "Don't let time govern you". The collection's resonance was unprecedented, selling out in 40 minutes. Its campaign revolutionized product presentation in India, by blurring reality and simulation through detailed 3D world-building.

URBNMNKYSYSTMS
A sub brand within Urban Monkey focusing on experimental, hyper-functional accessories. Its vision is to create an ecosystem of objects that plug into each other to form a whole, while also retaining their individual characteristics. This modular approach embodies continuous evolution, where each product is part of a larger adaptive system.

title: Chain Wallet // 001
description:
Meet the newest upgrade to your carry game — Urban Monkey’s black trifold wallet with a built-in pocket chain and carabiner for added safety and street-style edge. Crafted from 100% PVC-coated premium vegan leather, this wallet doesn’t just look good — it’s built for function.
Equipped with a dual snap button closure, this compact beast features a sleek gunmetal-finished metal logo, a quick-access outer compartment, and an intelligently designed interior. With multiple card slots, a zippered coin pocket, a clear ID/photo slot, a zipped currency holder, and an extra open pocket for bills or receipts — everything has its place.
Whether clipped to your belt loop for a ride or tucked into your pocket for a night out, this wallet is designed to move with you — without ever losing style or security. Proudly made in India.

title: Communication is Key
description:
With a community that rides high on words and verses - who else to rep this ultimatum?

This winter make sure to spit fire with the coolest hoodie in town, say it loud and clear after all communication is the key.

Make the perfect statement with this acid wash ‘Statement Hoodie’. Also, a little bit of Lilac never hurt nobody :)

Pair it with our essential joggers to complete your look!

title: No Logo // 002
description: No flashy logo. No bold prints.

title: Homerun
description: A cap built for the streets, inspired by the golden era of baseball and vintage sportswear. The Homerun cap brings the perfect blend of retro energy and modern street-style flair with its textured corduroy fabric, bold two-tone colorway, and graffiti-style embroidered UM logo. Designed for the grind and the good times, this white and red baseball cap is built to last with premium materials and reinforced stitching. Whether you're skating, styling, or just out hustling, this cap keeps your game strong.

title: Goofy
description: The Grand Slam cap effortlessly blends vintage aesthetics and modern street style. Inspired by classic varsity sportswear, this cap features a clean two-tone design, premium corduroy texture, and bold Urban Monkey script embroidery. Whether you're hitting the streets or relaxing, this cap delivers old-school charm and contemporary flair.

title: Source // 002
description: This sleek black PU faux leather cap brings together luxury and streetwear. Featuring an elevated Urban Monkey script embroidery in a subtle tone-on-tone style, it blends old-school aesthetics with modern streetwear. While the low-profile silhouette ensures a clean and effortless vibe.

title: Love Over Fear
description: More love, less fear—this cap is a reminder to move with confidence, passion, and purpose. The Love Over Fear cap blends a clean, minimal aesthetic with a bold statement, featuring striking red embroidery that symbolizes strength and resilience. Designed for those who lead with heart, this cap is built with premium materials and a timeless silhouette that fits any streetwear rotation.

title: Source // 001
description: This off-white PU faux leather cap brings together luxury and streetwear. Featuring an elevated Urban Monkey script embroidery in a subtle tone-on-tone style, it blends old-school aesthetics with modern streetwear. While the low-profile silhouette ensures a clean and effortless vibe.

title: Ghost
description: This sleek PU faux leather cap is the ultimate power move in headwear. Featuring an all-black finish and an elevated UM metal badge that redefines street luxury, this baseball cap is dark, bold and effortlessly cool.

title: Dawn
description:
No two caps are the same. Featuring a hand-sprayed finish, this cap is designed to make every piece one of a kind. The sleek metal UM badge adds a refined edge, the low-profile fit keeps it effortlessly stylish while the adjustable fit and breathable cotton fabric make it an everyday essential.

Disclaimer: You will receive a completely unique piece that will vary from the item pictured here. Each piece is spray painted by hand with love

title: Loose Fit Corduroy Trousers // Brown
description: An upgrade from your everyday jeans, these corduroy trousers bring a touch of old-school vintage charm with a modern streetwear twist. The loose fit gives you that effortless hip-hop silhouette, while the plush corduroy texture adds a layer of understated luxury. Dress them up or down—either way, they do the talking.

title: Loose Fit Corduroy Trousers // Khaki
description: An upgrade from your everyday jeans, these corduroy trousers bring a touch of old-school vintage charm with a modern streetwear twist. The loose fit gives you that effortless hip-hop silhouette, while the plush corduroy texture adds a layer of understated luxury. Dress them up or down—either way, they do the talking.

title: Flame
description:
Skate-inspired, street-certified, and built for the underground scene. Dripping in bold embroidery and corduroy texture, this cap is built for skaters, creators, and rule-breakers. The UMSB branding isn’t just for show—it’s a call to the underground. The dual-tone contrast brim and starburst detailing bring in that extra edge, making sure you stand out while keeping it low-key. Whether you're flipping decks or flipping trends, this one keeps you on top.

At Urban Monkey’s core, skateboarding cultivates a spirit of unity and solidarity, forging deep bonds within a community that supports and uplifts one another. It transforms competition and strife into a society of true brotherhood and sisterhood, where collective growth and collaboration thrive.

title: Evolve
description:
Create. Destroy. Rebuild. Skateboarding isn’t just a sport—it’s an evolution. And this cap embodies that ethos with its super suede finish, bold graphics, standout embroidery, and classic snapback fit, a silhouette that never misses. Whether you’re hitting the streets or the skatepark, this cap is your battle gear.

At Urban Monkey’s core, skateboarding cultivates a spirit of unity and solidarity, forging deep bonds within a community that supports and uplifts one another. It transforms competition and strife into a society of true brotherhood and sisterhood, where collective growth and collaboration thrive.

title: Steezy
description:
This cap is built differently—just like the community it represents. Featuring a bold UMSB embroidery on the structured crown and a textured corduroy brim, it’s got that raw, authentic energy. Designed for skaters, creators, and visionaries, this piece blends vintage aesthetics with street-level grit. With its vintage-inspired cream-and-green colorway, this cap feels like a classic from day one.

At Urban Monkey’s core, skateboarding cultivates a spirit of unity and solidarity, forging deep bonds within a community that supports and uplifts one another. It transforms competition and strife into a society of true brotherhood and sisterhood, where collective growth and collaboration thrive.

title: Stardust
description:
Every stitch of this cap tells a story—of underground culture, of movement, of rebellion. The UMSB 3D embroidery, contrast brim, and starburst accents turn this from just a cap into a statement piece. Wear it loud, wear it proud, blending in was never an option.

At Urban Monkey’s core, skateboarding cultivates a spirit of unity and solidarity, forging deep bonds within a community that supports and uplifts one another. It transforms competition and strife into a society of true brotherhood and sisterhood, where collective growth and collaboration thrive.

title: Shadow
description:
As a trucker cap, Shadow is built for function just as much as style. The breathable mesh back keeps you cool on the move, making it the perfect headwear for long skate sessions, city explorations, and everything in between. Whether you’re flipping tricks or flipping the script, this cap stays with you. With a washed effect that screams old-school cool, that gives it that perfect broken-in look from day one, this cap feels like it’s been part of your rotation for years.

At Urban Monkey’s core, skateboarding cultivates a spirit of unity and solidarity, forging deep bonds within a community that supports and uplifts one another. It transforms competition and strife into a society of true brotherhood and sisterhood, where collective growth and collaboration thrive.

title: UM Core Vintage // Mocha
description:
Experience the Upgraded UM Vintage Core Collection: Effortlessly Aged, Endlessly Cool.

Step into the all-new UM Core Collection with a twist—vintage meets modern in our Cloudy Fade Finish. This isn’t just a T-shirt; it’s a journey back to the golden era of style, with a soft, timeworn look that’s effortlessly cool. Delivering a subtle, weathered effect, reminiscent of lived-in favorites, they are perfectly imperfect. Each tee carries a unique vintage wash, elevating your wardrobe essentials to an iconic status.

title: Washed Denim Baseball Cap // Olive
description: Battle-ready military aesthetic with street-ready function. This denim baseball cap is distressed, detailed, and built for action. The washed olive green cotton base, raw edges, and intricate embroidery create a cap that looks like it’s been through missions—but still stands strong. Adjustable, breathable, and made to last.

title: Foldable Camper Cap // Olive
description: Engineered for the modern explorer, the camper cap is built for functionality and durability. Made from 100% water-resistant nylon, it handles rain, dust, and rugged terrain with ease. The foldable brim saves space, while the sunglass slot prevents discomfort. The extra pouch keeps essentials secure, and the dri-fit antibacterial sweatband ensures all-day freshness. Whether you're hiking, camping, or on the move, this cap has you covered.

title: Systms Camo Cap // Olive
description: Crafted in our signature high-performance fabric in military-inspired olive green camo with functional detailing, this cap is built for action. The elastic webbing on the side is designed to hold your pen, pencil, small tools or even secure the cap when not in use. This function for small gear storage makes it an essential for the modern-day operator.

title: Stash Pocket Snapback // Black
description: A built-in zip pocket for stashing small valuables. A D-ring clip for hands-free carry and quick attachment. A sleek, all-black look with a silicone patch that adds a futuristic edge. The stash pocket snapback is a high-functionality essential built for daily adventures. Lock in your look with this one-of-a-kind streetwear upgrade.

title: Custom Patch Cap // Black
description: Low-Key, High Impact. The future of minimal utility is here. Designed for those who move in silence but make an impact. Crafted from 100% nylon, it features a Velcro patch for interchangeable UM patches, letting you switch up your style in seconds. A D-ring detail at the back adds quick-attach functionality for effortless carry. Sleek, stealthy, and built for the streets.

title: Foldable Camper Cap // Lavender
description: Blaze new trails and go the distance. This cap features a foldable brim for easy packing and a sunglass slot to relieve ear strain, hands-free convenience and keep them secure. A dri-fit antibacterial sweatband ensures all-day comfort, while the lavender color adds a fresh touch to your outdoor gear.

title: Foldable Camper Cap // Black
description: Folds. Packs. Stores and Adapts. The camper cap is designed for those who demand more from their gear. Crafted from 100% water-resistant nylon to shield you from unexpected drizzles, it’s built to withstand the elements. A foldable brim with reflective detailing ensures visibility, while a built-in zip pocket + extra pouch keeps your essentials secure. Long hikes can get sweaty, but the dri-fit antibacterial sweatband keeps you cool, dry, and odor-free. Engineered for all-day comfort, this cap works as hard as you do.

title: Explorer
description: Featuring a bold yet minimal frame, these sunglasses are built for the curious soul. From the streets to the peaks, they’re made to match your unrelenting spirit.

title: Peak Drip // 002
description: Reach the summit of style with the Peak Drip sunnies. Its round frames and edgy accent details give you the ultimate fusion of retro vibes and modern cool. These shades are your go-to for stealing the spotlight effortlessly.

title: Peak Drip // 001
description: Reach the summit of style with the Peak Drip sunnies. Its round frames and edgy accent details give you the ultimate fusion of retro vibes and modern cool. These shades are your go-to for stealing the spotlight effortlessly.

title: Street Circuit // 002
description: Style on overdrive. Street Circuit sunglasses deliver a winning combination of bold frames and high-fashion appeal. Whether you're on the move or posing for the gram, they make every moment a statement. With cutting-edge details and a touch of streetwear edge, these shades are your license to thrill.

title: Street Circuit // 001
description: Style on overdrive. Street Circuit sunglasses deliver a winning combination of bold frames and high-fashion appeal. Whether you're on the move or posing for the gram, they make every moment a statement. With cutting-edge details and a touch of streetwear edge, these shades are your license to thrill.

title: Eclipse Core
description: Meet the iconic pilot shape, reimagined with a sleek, contemporary twist. Eclipse Core features agile lines and a streamlined structure, refined down to its essential curves. Finished with bold solid accents, these sunglasses are a perfect balance of timeless design and modern edge.

title: Racer // 003
description: Born for the streets, Racer sunglasses are a weapon of style. Designed for the rebels and rule-breakers, these brown and gold square-framed sunglasses are the epitome of confidence. From their oversized lenses to their stealthy finish, it turns every outfit into a power move. Keep your game tight and your vibe untouchable

title: Racer // 002
description: Born for the streets, Racer sunglasses are a weapon of style. Designed for the rebels and rule-breakers, these green and gold square framed sunglasses are the epitome of confidence. From their oversized lenses to their stealthy finish, it turns every outfit into a power move. Keep your game tight and your vibe untouchable.

title: Racer // 001
description: Born for the streets, Racer sunglasses are a weapon of style. Designed for the rebels and rule-breakers, these jet-black square framed sunglasses are the epitome of confidence. From their oversized lenses to their stealthy finish, it turns every outfit into a power move. Keep your game tight and your vibe untouchable.

title: Frost // 002
description: Sleek gunmetal meets cool green. With a minimalist yet striking design, these sunglasses bring a futuristic vibe that’s perfect for navigating any terrain. For those who prefer to lead with quiet confidence and make an unforgettable impression, these glasses are the ultimate go-to.

title: Frost // 001
description: Turn up the chill factor with Frost. These mirrored-lens sunglasses offer a cutting-edge look that’s as sharp as it is refreshing. Whether you’re on the go or off the grid, Frost keeps you shining while staying untouchably cool.

title: Jetline // 002
description: It’s golden hour anytime. Step into a world of clarity and warmth with Jetline Yellow. Featuring vibrant yellow lenses that illuminate your view, these sunglasses transform every moment into a golden hour. Paired with sharp edges and a smooth silver finish, they’re the perfect blend of retro energy and futuristic edge.

title: Jetline // 001
description: Welcome to the future of eyewear. Jetline combines sharp edges with a smooth matte finish for a look that’s as clean as it is commanding. Featuring ultra-black lenses that block out distractions, these sunglasses are built for those who move with purpose and thrive in mystery.

title: Blackout
description: Step into the shadows with Blackout. These bold, all-black frames are your ultimate companion for flying under the radar while making a statement. With their sleek silhouette and ultra-dark lenses, Blackout isn't just eyewear—it’s a vibe. Designed to keep the spotlight on you while you stay effortlessly cool.

title: Bucket Hat // Military Monkey
description: Built for the explorers, wanderers, and thrill-seekers, this camouflage bucket hat is your ultimate companion for safari holidays and outdoor escapades. Whether you’re tracking wildlife in the wild, hiking rugged trails, or just enjoying the outdoors, this bucket hat ensures you do it in style. Made from 100% durable cotton, it’s lightweight, breathable, and tough enough to keep up with your adrenaline-packed plans. The signature Urban Monkey metal badge adds a touch of streetwear sophistication, so even in the heart of the jungle, you’ll stand out as a style icon.

title: Bucket Hat // Fluffy Sherpa
description: Warm, soft, and undeniably hype — the Sherpa Bucket Hat in off-white is everything you need for your streetwear look. With a fluffy texture and a clean rich PU label branding, this hat brings an edge to your casual fits, offering that effortlessly cool, gangsta vibe. Perfect for staying cozy while flexing your style — because why not have both?

title: Bucket Hat // Futura
description: A bucket hat that’s built to last — and look good while doing it. This signature black bucket hat by Urban Monkey combines classic design with modern performance. Crafted from durable nylon, it offers a comfortable fit for all-day wear, featuring our iconic Urban Monkey metal badge for that signature touch. The dry-fit, anti-bacterial sweatband keeps you cool and fresh, whether you're on the move or chilling in the sun.

title: UM Training Bucket Hat // Never Stop Playin’
description: Engineered for movement — the Athleisure Bucket Hat in Black is where sport meets streetwear. As part of the exclusive Urban Monkey Athleisure© collection, this hat is built to perform, no matter the challenge. Whether you’re hitting the courts, running the city, or lounging post-workout, it’s the ultimate blend of function and fashion. Made from 100% Ripstop Polyester, it’s tough, lightweight, and built to last. Featuring a dry-fit, anti-bacterial sweatband, it keeps you cool and fresh during intense sessions. With UPF 50+ sun protection and advanced moisture-wicking tech, this bucket hat is your all-weather MVP.

title: Bucket Hat // Chill
description: Ready to take life one vibe at a time? Introducing the Chill Bucket Hat — your go-to for effortless cool. Crafted in soft, breathable off-white cotton, this bucket hat is as versatile as your wardrobe needs it to be. The front features the word 'chill' embroidered in a clean, bold style, so everyone knows your vibe without you saying a word. Whether you’re lounging by the beach, wandering through the city, or just keeping it low-key, this bucket hat has your head in the game (and out of the sun).

title: Check Corduroy Shirt 009 // regular fit
description: Our designs and silhouettes draw much of our inspiration from skateboarding culture, which shines through in this vintage checkered full-sleeved shirt crafted in cotton corduroy. Cut for a relaxed fit, it is patterned with a classic check print punctuated by the brand's logo lettering.

title: Check Corduroy Shirt 008 // regular fit
description: Our designs and silhouettes draw much of our inspiration from skateboarding culture, which shines through in this vintage checkered full-sleeved shirt crafted in cotton corduroy. Cut for a relaxed fit, it is patterned with a classic check print punctuated by the brand's logo lettering.

title: Hobo Shacket // Brown
description: Part of our Legacy™ collection, Urban Monkey’s all-new heavy cotton twill oversized shirt jackets are a timeless essential. With a roomy fit for easy layering, this mocha brown jacket works perfectly as an easy-throw-on layer to swing effortlessly between a relaxed, off-duty vibe to amping it up for a night on the town. Made in India.

title: Button Down Lightweight Jacket // Olive Green
description: Built for the unexpected. This jacket is crafted from a lightweight performance fabric that’s slightly water-resistant and quick-drying — perfect for sudden drizzles, morning mist, or post-surf winds. While it’s not fully waterproof (and doesn’t pretend to be), it dries fast and keeps moving with you, making it ideal for daily wear, travel, and unpredictable weather. No bulk, no drama — just smart design made to keep pace.

title: Reflective Fisherman Beanie // Orange
description: The ultimate glow-up. Make every outfit unforgettable with the URBMNKYSYSTMS reflective orange beanie. Stitched with reflective fiber woven into the yarn, this beanie reflects with a little flash and flair in low light. This feature keeps you seen and safe during night activities. Its rich, fiery tone delivers instant style impact, while the soft, durable fabric ensures lasting comfort. Perfect for layering in winter or rocking solo on breezy days, it’s a wardrobe essential with attitude.

title: Reflective Fisherman Beanie // Gray
description: Simple. Sleek. Perfect. Designed to adapt, this gray beanie part of the URBMNKYSYSTMS collection - delivers understated style and superior functionality. Stitched with reflective fiber woven into the yarn, this beanie reflects with a little flash and flair in low light. This feature keeps you seen and safe during night activities. Its minimal design and cozy fit make it your everyday essential for adventures or easy chill days.

title: Recycled Knit Cuff Beanie // Mustard Yellow
description: Planet-First winter essential. Your everyday accessory, reimagined for a sustainable tomorrow. This recycled beanie is more than a fashion choice—it's a promise to the planet. Crafted from repurposed materials, it’s lightweight, cozy, and stylish. Wear it with pride, knowing you’re reducing your footprint with every snug fit.

title: Recycled Knit Cuff Beanie // Snow White
description: Planet-First winter essential. Step into sustainable style with our recycled beanie, designed for conscious fashion enthusiasts. Each piece is made from post-consumer materials, keeping waste out of landfills and giving it a second life. Soft, durable, and planet-friendly, it’s the ultimate accessory for an eco-forward lifestyle.

title: Recycled Fisherman Beanie // Neon Green
description: The beanie that cares. Wrap up in warmth and good vibes with this recycled beanie that doesn’t just look good—it does good. Every thread tells a story of repurposed materials, reducing waste and protecting the planet. Perfect for the eco-conscious trendsetter, this beanie combines timeless style with a commitment to Earth-first fashion. Saving the world never looked so good. Make sustainability your statement.

title: Recycled Fisherman Beanie // Black
description: Warmth for you, Care for the planet. Join the movement toward a better planet with this recycled black beanie. Minimal design, maximum impact—this is conscious fashion at its best. Made from sustainable materials, it’s proof that style and responsibility can go hand in hand. Look great, feel warm, and do good for the Earth.

title: Knit Cuff Beanie // Pixel
description: Crafted from ultra-soft, premium knit fabric, this beanie wraps you in next-level comfort while serving serious style. Designed to keep you cozy all day long, it’s the ultimate cold-weather flex—perfect for commanding attention on chilly city streets or injecting bold energy into your everyday vibe. Whether you’re rocking edgy streetwear or laid-back casuals, this beanie effortlessly blends standout design with unmatched functionality.

title: Fisherman Beanie // Earth
description: With art in every thread, this textured beanie is a masterpiece and made for those who appreciate details. Featuring a mesmerizing woven design in blue and earthy tones, this beanie adds a pop of artistic flair to any outfit. The intricate, multicolored weave and minimalist Urban Monkey patch add effortless style to your winter fits. Whether you’re dressing up or keeping it casual, this beanie uplifts your look while keeping you cozy and cool.

title: 3M™ Thinsulate™ Insulation Beanie // Gray
description: For those who love to keep it sleek, the "<3" Beanie is your winter go-to. Part of the Urban Monkey Systems collection, this unisex essential features 3M™ Thinsulate™ Insulation to lock in warmth without adding bulk. The subtle gray base elevated by blue embroidery gives a futuristic edge, while the stretch fit ensures a snug, universal wear. Part of the URBMNKYSYSTMS collection—where functionality meets style.

title: 3M™ Thinsulate™ Insulation Beanie // Black
description: Introducing the Urban Monkey "<3" Beanie—a bold statement for cold days. Featuring 3M™ Thinsulate™ Insulation for unmatched warmth, part of the URBMNKYSYSTMS collection, this lightweight, stretch-fit beanie ensures comfort and style. The vibrant "<3" embroidery paired with "HYPR-FNCTNL-LSA" detailing on the fold brings a modern, tech-inspired edge to your look.

title: 3M™ Thinsulate™ Insulation Beanie // Camo
description: Stay ahead of the chill with Urban Monkey’s 3M™ Thinsulate™ Beanie that features extremely fine micro fibres that trap air and block radiant heat loss, all while allowing moisture to escape. Featuring our in-house camo print, this lightweight yet ultra-warm beanie is part of the URBMNKYSYSTMS collection—where functionality meets style. The stretch-fit design ensures a snug yet comfortable wear for everyone, while embroidery detailing and a woven patch add that streetwear edge. With its innovative insulation and one-size-fits-most design, this is the beanie you’ll reach for every day.

title: Laptop Bag // 001
description: Introducing Urban Monkey’s first-ever laptop bag — a sleek, all-black, vegan design crafted from premium PU for a modern and sustainable touch. Perfectly blending style and functionality, this bag is your ultimate work companion. Designed with robust storage solutions, it features a secure laptop compartment, three internal slip pockets for organizing cables and adapters,a zippered compartment for your ipad, kindle or important documents and a spacious main compartment for everything else. A zippered front and back pocket offers quick access to essentials. Carry it your way using the rolled-edge ergonomic handles or the detachable crossbody strap. Travel with ease using the trolley sleeve for seamless mobility. Smartly designed with careful dimensions, this laptop bag ensures generous storage and effortless versatility for your daily hustle. Designed to accommodate laptops of various sizes, fits any laptop of up to 15’’(measured diagonally) or 13’’(measured horizontally).

title: Spider // 003
description: We are on a mission to revive the golden age of sunglasses-The Spider is a testament to that era. These sleek rectangle gunmetal frames, with their classic black lenses, take you back to a time when style was timeless. Special details elevate this piece, making it an essential for anyone who values true vintage cool.

title: Specter // 005
description: Meet your next power move: The Specter. These sophisticated aviators take the classic style to a whole new level, perfect for anyone who demands attention. Whether you’re owning the night at a high-profile party or adding a touch of luxury to your everyday look, The Specter is your ultimate statement piece. An upgrade on our bestselling Avenger glasses.

title: Trifold Wallet // 002
description: The latest addition to our wallet collection is this brand new trifold wallet in a rugged camo that boasts of six quick-access card slots, ensuring you can effortlessly retrieve your most-used cards with ease. Need a secure spot for your loose change or cash? The zipped pocket provides a safe haven for your valuables, while the open pocket neatly accommodates bills, receipts, and more.

title: Grid Storm Ripstop Backpack
description:
Engineered for hustle, designed for style, and ready for anything life throws at you. This 20L powerhouse is crafted with a sleek, ultra-durable two-tone ripstop material and coated with waterproof TPU to keep your gear safe, dry, and looking sharp—no matter the chaos.
From your grind to your getaway, this bag’s got you covered. The padded 15/16” laptop compartment protects your tech while the smartly placed front and hidden top pockets let you grab what you need without breaking stride. With padded, adjustable shoulder straps and a design that’s 100% vegan, it’s all-day comfort without compromise.
Big enough to hold your world, yet sleek enough to match your vibe—this backpack is more than a carry-all. It’s the most essential accessory you’ll ever own. Don’t just keep up. Lead the pack.

title: Versatile Relaxed Fit Trousers // Cloud Gray
description: Crafted from lightweight, easy to move fabric, our new relaxed fit trousers bring effortless versatility to your wardrobe. With a relaxed straight-leg fit and an elasticated waistband, these pants are made for movement—whether you’re on the grind or unwinding. Pair them with an oversized hoodie or a statement tee for that classic Urban Monkey vibe.

title: Versatile Relaxed Fit Trousers // Sandstone
description: Crafted from lightweight, easy-to-move fabric, our new relaxed fit trousers bring effortless versatility to your wardrobe. With a relaxed straight-leg fit and an elasticated waistband, these pants are made for movement—whether you’re on the grind or unwinding. Pair them with an oversized hoodie or a statement tee for that classic Urban Monkey vibe.

title: Versatile Relaxed Fit Trousers // Olive
description: Crafted from lightweight, easy to move fabric, our new relaxed fit trousers bring effortless versatility to your wardrobe. With a relaxed straight-leg fit and an elasticated waistband, these pants are made for movement—whether you’re on the grind or unwinding. Pair them with an oversized hoodie or a statement tee for that classic Urban Monkey vibe.

description:
Turn heads with this Umsb Oversized Tee—a bold oversized piece that blends skate culture and streetwear perfectly. Crafted from premium cotton for breathable comfort, this electric blue T-shirt features striking graffiti-inspired graphics in vibrant orange and yellow, making a powerful statement.

At Urban Monkey’s core, skateboarding cultivates a spirit of unity and solidarity, forging deep bonds within a community that supports and uplifts one another. It transforms competition and strife into a society of true brotherhood and sisterhood, where collective growth and collaboration thrive.

description:
Step into campus legend status with the UMSB Varsity Jacket. Featuring bold assets on chest and back, this jacket combines school spirit with skatepark vibes. Made from premium fabric with elasticated cuffs and snap-button closure, it’s your go-to for grinding rails or acing finals. Complete with side pockets to stash your essentials, this unisex fit is a certified crowd favorite.

At Urban Monkey’s core, skateboarding cultivates a spirit of unity and solidarity, forging deep bonds within a community that supports and uplifts one another. It transforms competition and strife into a society of true brotherhood and sisterhood, where collective growth and collaboration thrive.

description: Welcome to the Zion era—where oversized meets over-the-top cool. The ultimate oversized sunglasses for those who demand the spotlight. With bold, futuristic frames straight off the A-list radar, these shades are your ticket to Instagram fame and paparazzi-worthy moments.

title: Venom // 003
description: Be the predator, not the prey. Strike first with The Venom—a deadly blend of style and edge. Sleek, sharp, and unapologetically fierce,they feature sharp, custom-cut frames that mimic a snake’s lethal allure. These sunglasses are your ultimate weapon for making a bold statement. Wear them and own the power.

title: Shadowfang // 002
description: Shadowfang: where function meets ferocity. With oversized frames and a sleek shield like design, these sunglasses provide maximum eye protection while serving a look straight from the future. Whether you're tearing up the road or braving the urban jungle, they’ve got your back.

title: Specter // 003
description: Meet your next power move: The Specter. These sophisticated aviators take the classic style to a whole new level, perfect for anyone who demands attention. Whether you’re owning the night at a high-profile party or adding a touch of luxury to your everyday look, The Specter is your ultimate statement piece. An upgrade on our bestselling Avenger glasses.
